1911 Obaks for sale... 

please add $4 for s/h, includes delivery confirmation.  Insurance is additional $1.75

Raymer - Victoria - very light front crease. Red ink on top corner. Paper loss on back. Very nice front image $25

Powell - San Francisco - no creasing. Paper loss on back $25

Reddick - Victoria - has crease, does not go through the back. paper attached on back. great card if you know how to remove. $25

Miller - Oakland - paper separating on right border. paper attached and small loss on reverse. $25

Mahoney - Sacramento - light crease. Very nice front. Back has paper loss $25.




Paypal accepted. 

Email is [url]deadballera@comcast.net[/url]
BUMP for LAST CHANCE price reduction.

great transaction, Todd!!
many,many thanks.

best,

barry
